class.name: Phaser.FlexGrid
class.help:
WARNING: This is an EXPERIMENTAL class. The API will change significantly in the coming versions and is incomplete.
Please try to avoid using in production games with a long time to build.
This is also why the documentation is incomplete.

FlexGrid is a a responsive grid manager that works in conjunction with the ScaleManager RESIZE scaling mode and FlexLayers
to provide for game object positioning in a responsive manner.

public.name: createCustomLayer
public.help: A custom layer is centered on the game and maintains its aspect ratio as it scales up and down.

parameters.name: width
parameters.help: Width of this layer in pixels.

parameters.name: height
parameters.help: Height of this layer in pixels.

parameters.name: children
parameters.help: An array of children that are used to populate the FlexLayer.

public.name: createFixedLayer
public.help: A fixed layer is centered on the game and is the size of the required dimensions and is never scaled.

parameters.name: children
parameters.help: An array of children that are used to populate the FlexLayer.

public.name: createFluidLayer
public.help: A fluid layer is centered on the game and maintains its aspect ratio as it scales up and down.

parameters.name: children
parameters.help: An array of children that are used to populate the FlexLayer.

public.name: createFullLayer
public.help: A full layer is placed at 0,0 and extends to the full size of the game. Children are scaled according to the fluid ratios.

parameters.name: children
parameters.help: An array of children that are used to populate the FlexLayer.

public.name: debug
public.help: Call in the render function to output the bounds rects.

public.name: onResize
public.help: Called when the game container changes dimensions.

parameters.name: width
parameters.help: The new width of the game container.

parameters.name: height
parameters.help: The new height of the game container.

public.name: refresh
public.help: Updates all internal vars such as the bounds and scale values.

public.name: setSize
public.help: Sets the core game size. This resets the w/h parameters and bounds.

public.name: game
public.inlineHelp: A reference to the currently running Game.

public.name: scaleFactor
public.inlineHelp: The scale factor based on the game dimensions vs. the scaled dimensions.
